00028 #ifndef __D3D11HARDWAREBUFFER_H__

00032 #include "OgreHardwareBuffer.h"
00033 
00034 namespace Ogre { 
00035 
00036 
00040     class D3D11HardwareBuffer : public HardwareBuffer
00041     {
00042     public:
00043         enum BufferType
00044         {
00045             VERTEX_BUFFER,
00046             INDEX_BUFFER
00047         };
00048     protected:
00049         ID3D11Buffer* mlpD3DBuffer;
00050         bool mUseTempStagingBuffer;
00051         D3D11HardwareBuffer* mpTempStagingBuffer;
00052         bool mStagingUploadNeeded;
00053         BufferType mBufferType;
00054         D3D11Device & mDevice;
00055         D3D11_BUFFER_DESC mDesc;
00056 
00057 
00058 
00060         void* lockImpl(size_t offset, size_t length, LockOptions options);
00062         void unlockImpl(void);
00063 
00064     public:
00065         D3D11HardwareBuffer(BufferType btype, size_t sizeBytes, HardwareBuffer::Usage usage, 
00066             D3D11Device & device, bool useSystemMem, bool useShadowBuffer, bool streamOut);
00067         ~D3D11HardwareBuffer();
00069         void readData(size_t offset, size_t length, void* pDest);
00071         void writeData(size_t offset, size_t length, const void* pSource,
00072             bool discardWholeBuffer = false);
00074         void copyData(HardwareBuffer& srcBuffer, size_t srcOffset, 
00075             size_t dstOffset, size_t length, bool discardWholeBuffer = false);
00076 
00078         ID3D11Buffer* getD3DBuffer(void) { return mlpD3DBuffer; }
00079     };
00080
